|cpu1chip1 = TriDuctor;VSPM340; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q16; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB64MI6FP-DH; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |voip_ports = 2 |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:E0:FC, 48:DB:50 |oui = 00:E0:FC, 48:DB:50

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192ER; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AE; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Huawei AV1HG255SM REV.A (HG255s-10)
===Specifications=== *Wi-Fi: AC1200, 2.4GHz (300Mbps) + 5GHz (867Mbps) :2x U.FL pigtail + internal PCB on-board antenna :2x FSX (phone) port, internal DECT/CAT-IQ baze station :VoIP, DLNA, IPTV, IPv6 supported
*CPU: [http://www.triductor.com/index.php/en/soc-chip/gateway TriDuctor] [http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/2608885 VSPM340] @1GHz (Dual-Core ARM Cortex A9) :High-end xDSL Processor SoC For Multi-media IADs & Gateways :Multiple high-end WAN connectivity options: XDSL, Gigabit Ethernet ::and USB 3.0 for LTE fixed-wireless modems. :Supports Gigabit dual-band concurrent Wi-Fi by dual PCIe interfaces, ::multi GbE and VoIP & DECT interfaces with DSP accelerator. :1GHz dual-core ARM Cortex A9 processor plus additional offload engines ::and dedicated routing accelerator.
*5GHz Power Amplifier Module: [https://www.qorvo.com/products/p/RFFM4501#overview RFFM4501] :5GHz 802.11an/ac Wi-Fi Front End Module :Integrated 4.9GHz to 5.85GHz Amplifier :SPDT TX/RX Switch, LNA with Bypass, Power Detector Coupler : POUT = 19.5dBm, 11a/n, 5V <3% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 17dBm, 11n, 3.3V 2.5% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 21dBm, 11a/n, 5V 2.5% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 17dBm, 11a/n, 3.3V 2.5% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 16dBm, 11ac HT80 MCS9, 3.3V, 1.8% Dynamic EVM : POUT = 18dBm, 11ac HT80 MCS9 5.0V, 1.8% Dynamic EVM
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.donanimhaber.com/superonline-huawei-hg255s-5ghz-router-ana-konu--106322365 ''Main Subject HG255s''] *[https://forum.donanimhaber.com/huawei-hg255s-wifi-errors-slow-throughput--131523340#131524228 ''Huawei HG255s - WiFi Errors - Slow Throughput'']

==Notes== ===Root user/Pass=== :Root / fbr_2015_Hua (not working in HG255sC163B037)
